name: R5-DeviceRequest-R4-DeviceRequest
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 DeviceRequest into FHIR R4

target.comment: R5 `DeviceRequest` maps as Equivalent to R4 `DeviceRequest`
R5 `DeviceRequest.authoredOn` maps as Equivalent to R4 `DeviceRequest.authoredOn`
R5 `DeviceRequest.basedOn` maps as Equivalent to R4 `DeviceRequest.basedOn`

R5 `DeviceRequest.code` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `DeviceRequest.code[x]` - code[x] has change due to type change: R5 code CodeableReference has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 code[x]
R5 `DeviceRequest.contained` maps as Equivalent to R4 `DeviceRequest.contained`

element.display: True if the request is to stop or not to start using the device

target.comment: R5 `DeviceRequest.encounter` maps as Equivalent to R4 `DeviceRequest.encounter`

R5 `DeviceRequest.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `DeviceRequest.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`
R5 `DeviceRequest.groupIdentifier` maps as Equivalent to R4 `DeviceRequest.groupIdentifier`
R5 `DeviceRequest.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `DeviceRequest.id`
R5 `DeviceRequest.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R4 `DeviceRequest.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R5 `DeviceRequest.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R4 `DeviceRequest.implicitRules`
R5 `DeviceRequest.instantiatesCanonical` maps as Equivalent to R4 `DeviceRequest.instantiatesCanonical`
R5 `DeviceRequest.instantiatesUri` maps as Equivalent to R4 `DeviceRequest.instantiatesUri`
R5 `DeviceRequest.insurance` maps as Equivalent to R4 `DeviceRequest.insurance`

element.display: proposal | plan | directive | order | original-order | reflex-order | filler-order | instance-order | option

target.display: proposal | plan | directive | order | original-order | reflex-order | filler-order | instance-order | option
target.comment: R5 `DeviceRequest.intent` maps as Equivalent to R4 `DeviceRequest.intent` - intent has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/request-intent|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/request-intent|4.0.1 (Equivalent)

R5 `DeviceRequest.language` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R4 `DeviceRequest.language` - language changed the binding strength from Required to Preferred; language has change due to type change: R5 `language` `code` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R4 `language`
R5 `DeviceRequest.meta` maps as Equivalent to R4 `DeviceRequest.meta`

R5 `DeviceRequest.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `DeviceRequest.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`
R5 `DeviceRequest.note` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `DeviceRequest.note` - note has change due to type change: R5 `note` `Annotation` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `note`

element.display: Desired time or schedule for use

target.display: Desired time or schedule for use
target.comment: R5 `DeviceRequest.occurrence[x]` maps as Equivalent to R4 `DeviceRequest.occurrence[x]`
R5 `DeviceRequest.parameter` maps as Equivalent to R4 `DeviceRequest.parameter`
R5 `DeviceRequest.parameter.code` maps as Equivalent to R4 `DeviceRequest.parameter.code`

R5 `DeviceRequest.parameter.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `DeviceRequest.parameter.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`
R5 `DeviceRequest.parameter.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `DeviceRequest.parameter.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `DeviceRequest.parameter.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `DeviceRequest.parameter.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`
R5 `DeviceRequest.parameter.value[x]` maps as Equivalent to R4 `DeviceRequest.parameter.value[x]`

R5 `DeviceRequest.performer` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `DeviceRequest.performer` - performer has change due to type change: R5 performer CodeableReference has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 performer

R5 `DeviceRequest.priority` maps as Equivalent to R4 `DeviceRequest.priority` - priority has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/request-priority|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/request-priority|4.0.1 (Equivalent)

R5 `DeviceRequest.reason` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `DeviceRequest.reasonCode` - reasonCode has change due to type change: R5 reason CodeableReference has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 reasonCode

R5 `DeviceRequest.reason` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `DeviceRequest.reasonReference` - reasonReference removed a binding requirement - Example http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/condition-code; reasonReference has change due to type change: R5 reason CodeableReference has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 reasonReference
R5 `DeviceRequest.relevantHistory` maps as Equivalent to R4 `DeviceRequest.relevantHistory`
R5 `DeviceRequest.replaces` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `DeviceRequest.priorRequest` - priorRequest has change due to type change: R5 `replaces` `Reference` maps as RelatedTo for R4 `priorRequest`
R5 `DeviceRequest.requester` maps as Equivalent to R4 `DeviceRequest.requester`

element.display: draft | active | on-hold | revoked | completed | entered-in-error | unknown

target.display: draft | active | on-hold | revoked | completed | entered-in-error | unknown
target.comment: R5 `DeviceRequest.status` maps as Equivalent to R4 `DeviceRequest.status` - status has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/request-status|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/request-status|4.0.1 (Equivalent)
R5 `DeviceRequest.subject` maps as Equivalent to R4 `DeviceRequest.subject`
R5 `DeviceRequest.supportingInfo` maps as Equivalent to R4 `DeviceRequest.supportingInfo`

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R5 `DeviceRequest.text` maps as Equivalent to R4 `DeviceRequest.text`
